name: REDWOOD HOLDINGS, LLC FKA REDWOOD CAPITAL INVESTMENTS
sampleDescriptions:
HCR: Medicare Advantage issues; Health Care Reimbursement; Home health long-term care issues as it relates to health care reform implementation.
Tax: Issues related to Opportunity Zones.
Legislation related to work opportunity tax credit and opportunity zones.
Medicare Advantage issues; Health Care Reimbursement; Home health long-term care issues as it relates to health care reform implementation; issues relating to the impact of the COVID-19 emergency.
Medicare Advantage issues; Health Care Reimbursement; Home health long-term care issues as it relates to health care reform implementation.
Legislative issues related to the work opportunity tax credit, opportunity zones, the section 199A passthrough deduction, and the deductibility of certain floor plan financing.

Issues related to H.R.6833, Improve and Enhance the Work Opportunity Tax Credit Act, H.R.5761, Opportunity Zones Transparency, Extension, and Improvement Act, H.R.4721/S.1706, Main Street Tax Certainty Act, and H.R.3624/S.3345, Travel Trailer and Camper Tax Parity Act.
Issues related to H.R.1177/S.492, Improve and Enhance the Work Opportunity Tax Credit Act, H.R.703/S.213, Main Street Tax Certainty Act, and H.R.332/S.1314, Travel Trailer and Camper Tax Parity Act.
Issues concerning ongoing contract for apparel for TSA employees.
Issues related to H.R.1177/S.492, Improve and Enhance the Work Opportunity Tax Credit Act, H.R.703, Main Street Tax Certainty Act, and H.R.332/S.1314, Travel Trailer and Camper Tax Parity Act.
